website_summaries.verdict: The number 1 way to kill mosquitoes and other outdoor bugs.
pros: After application, humans and animals can re-enter area within 5 to 10 minutes
Reviewers love that it keeps mosquitoes away for days if not weeks
Great for those who don't like or are allergic to products containing Deet
cons: Best to use on a day that isn't windy
Must be used with a fogger machine

customer_reviews.title: I love the smell of dead mosquitoes in the evening...Smells like victory...
customer_reviews.text: Cue the Wagner and let the clouds of vengeance roll across all the lands your eyes survey that they may be freed from the dark grip of the blood-fed hordes!
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Stuff works GREAT.
customer_reviews.text: Stuff works GREAT. Just make sure there is no wind or it just blows away and then is not effective. We have a REAL mosquito issue here and lots of green stuff all over our property so this is a necessity if you are going to be out around the pool or patio and don't want to get carried off! lol
customer_reviews.author: No925r

customer_reviews.title: Must apply without wind
customer_reviews.text: This product works great and one application keeps mosquitoes away for days, but only if used with VERY little to no wind as it must be able to linger to work properly.
customer_reviews.author: Mellissa Eisenmann

customer_reviews.title: This product works!!
customer_reviews.text: This product works well. Not recommended to use around people withbreathing problems as it is strong. Lasts around 3-5 days on one spraying or "fogging". I've purchased several of these bottles and won't compromise with another brand. Just buy it. You'll enjoy it's results!!
customer_reviews.author: George Rye

customer_reviews.title: This fogging chemical works wonderful. I am able to work outside without the ...
customer_reviews.text: The black flies and mosquitoes are horrid in the spring in the northwoods of Michigan. This fogging chemical works wonderful. I am able to work outside without the insects driving me nuts.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Mosquitoes hate this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years in my propane fogging device. This years extensive rain had caused a huge mosquito problem. Now with more fogging fluid, I can keep the little buggers at bay!
customer_reviews.author: HiPowerShooter

customer_reviews.title: Absolute necessity for outdoor activity
customer_reviews.text: Absolute necessity for summer outdoor activity. I fog my backyard before any outdoor activity and it works great. Better than any citronella or zapper. Couldn’t live without my digger
customer_reviews.author: Rangerstar

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but rarely works well.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but does not work very well. When I first started using it last year it seemed to work better but now even 30 minutes after spraying the mosquitoes are biting. Has the insecticide changed?
customer_reviews.author: MamaJack

customer_reviews.title: Excellent deal
customer_reviews.text: If you haven't used a fogger to clear your yard, you don't know what you are missing. Rather than buy can after can of yard guard, get a fogger and use this spray. Clears out a yard quickly of mosquito, ticks and other pests for hours.
customer_reviews.author: James Sloey

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We have 35 acres and it is difficult to rid all of the mosquitos, however, applying it around the house really minimizes the population and it makes it comfortable for sitting outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Grandpa John

customer_reviews.title: Must have product! The Fogger really works when using ...
customer_reviews.text: Must have product! The Fogger really works when using this product. May and June I spray sometimes three times a day just to make sure the flying bugs aren't. The wife can actually sit outside without spraying a can of DEET on her.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Follow the directions.
customer_reviews.text: Follow the directions and use the proper fogger and this stuff works. Use an hour before your guest arrive and relax.
customer_reviews.author: Boi Named Sous

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t kill any thing. Just repelled
customer_reviews.text: Just scares them off. Doesn’t kill any thing. You have to spray every day to keep some bugs away. It’s better than nothing.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your time or money
customer_reviews.text: Product does not kill mosquitoes or flies. I produced a nice thick cloud... several times, to saturate the foliage around my home- with no wind present. It doesn’t seem to bother the flies one bit, and the mosquitoes are as mean as ever. Save your time and money, buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Travis M

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: My Husband has used this twice around our yard and it has been effective in keeping the biting flies and mosquitoes away from our house.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Really did a job on the misquitoes .
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with a job well done. It was easy to use and bugs are gone. Will use it again. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: marilyn daley

customer_reviews.title: What’s most important you know is not to buy this product
customer_reviews.text: It’s not working and it doesn’t kill any mosquitoes waste of money I spray everything every day and mosquitoes are coming like nothing happens
customer_reviews.author: Mikhail Sidorov

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: If it kills giant man eating mosquitoes in Alaska, it will kill them at your house!! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mosquito geater
customer_reviews.text: Have been using Black Flag fogging for years. Good product for mosquitos.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Neitsch

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: So glad to find this. It was Hard to find item in stores after a huirricane.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Jackson

customer_reviews.title: It kills the bugs Great product last last several hours in
customer_reviews.text: It kills the bugs Great product last last several hours in Florida
customer_reviews.author: Rainmaker

customer_reviews.title: Works without a strong odor!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a fogger this year instead of paying for a service. This has been a great tool for our outdoor living spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Twain

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for a couple of years now with my Burgess fogger. Best on the market in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Owner_Operator

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Not cheap- But it works. Lasts about 1 dat. If you are having guests, spray in the morning and you will be able to enjoy being outside,
customer_reviews.author: Roda46

customer_reviews.title: Mosquito Control
customer_reviews.text: With regular applications, we are able to maintain a mosquito free zone around the house. The fogger and this insecticide have made outside time more pleasant and enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: MaryEmN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great at keeping the mosquito population down, just wish it worked on noseeums!
customer_reviews.author: HappiKampers

customer_reviews.title: Did not get rid of mosquitos!
customer_reviews.text: Same number of biters and used multiple times over period of a month.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only used once so far camping, but seemed to do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Donna S.

customer_reviews.title: Effective against flying insects
customer_reviews.text: Effective against mosquitoes, but watch out for bees and other pollinators.
customer_reviews.author: DH - SWFL

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. I was working outside after 5mins of fogging the yard and 2 mosquitoes were landing on my leg.
customer_reviews.author: Toan Le

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product takes care of mosquitos in our back yard patio area !!
customer_reviews.author: Ramona Meharg

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not sure it kills the mosquitoes, but just runs them off.
customer_reviews.author: Blackhat

customer_reviews.title: Works when used correctly
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works when applied correctly. I'm in windy West Texas. If I apply it during no or very low wind then we go all evening (even after the wind picks up) with mosquitoes and we don't have to smell like bug spray! If it's too windy, it just blows away. The higher the wind, the closer to the ground you should use your fogger, or so it seems to me.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Avoid windy conditions.
customer_reviews.text: 10 minutes of fogging and my 1 acre lot was insect free for hours of fun with the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Higgins

customer_reviews.title: As advertised and on time.
customer_reviews.text: Good product at a great price. Delivery was on time.
customer_reviews.author: Brice Martin

customer_reviews.title: This Black Flag Fogging Insecticide is great stuff. We live in the woods with a ...
customer_reviews.text: This Black Flag Fogging Insecticide is great stuff. We live in the woods with a river close by and I fog morning & evening and no mosquitos. PL
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bringer of mosquito death
customer_reviews.text: It did a great job. Highly recommend for mosquitoe problems.
customer_reviews.author: Muncypa

customer_reviews.title: worked great went camping had water and dense trees and grass ...
customer_reviews.text: worked great went camping had water and dense trees and grass super easy to use kept everything bug free where I fogged step out side that area and it was open buffet the only problem is the tank to big for stem of fogger going to try the mason jar next time and does not control flies that was sad needed help with that
customer_reviews.author: jeanne burger

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Now one week post spray and no mosquitoes at all . Fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Gros

customer_reviews.title: Great product. 4 stars is just for the fact ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. 4 stars is just for the fact none of the product I have ever tried has protected us from mosquitoes 100%. This product comes close to as best as it comes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but wear a mask!
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Just wait for still air outside....oh and wear mask.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Maramara

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: WORKS well, especially with all the rain we've had, skeeters would be carrying us away....
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: ... makes them even more aggressive I don't nor can't recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Well it does not have any effect on the skeeters in Arkansas if anything it makes them even more aggressive I don't nor can't recommend this product sorry
customer_reviews.author: Rodney R.

customer_reviews.title: i don't recommend this item
customer_reviews.text: Don't believe review. don't kill Mosquito . i don't recommend this item. west money...
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: Product works great , !!! Good decision on buy! Will keep a stock in my garage , the fogger system kills fast ! Just follow the directions ! And get the 3 jug pack! Best Buy!
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Insecticide/insect repellant? Not hardly!
customer_reviews.text: not sure about it actually working .... fogged the inside of my house when someone left the door open and the place was full of them ... shot a bit of fog into each room and left the place closed up for 30 minutes .... aired it out and then went inside .... mosquitos were still alive and well. Same for repelling them on my back porch ... not much good for keeping them away more than 30 minutes. The first fogging solution was the best one ... think it was also made by or for burgess.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Could use improvement
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I have is it should be a bit stronger. It doesn't work on bees or wasps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't kill mosquitos.
customer_reviews.text: Mosquitos were flying around in the thick fog irritated but unaffected. A few got knocked down to catch their breath then got off. Maybe killed 5 out of 100. I am better off with cans of bug spray this was worthless investment for the fogger and this liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Zach
